hanzi-su-wiki:
墜

Значения

Падать

Мнемоника

Свиньи 豕, т.е. захватчики, лезут на стены 阝, но падают на землю 土.

Варианты

坠

падать; уронить; утяжелить

(Simplified: 坠)
Pictophonetic: 隊 indicates the sound; 土 (earth) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
墜毀 [ zhuì huǐ ]: (of an airplane etc) to fall to the ground and crash
墜落 [ zhuì luò ]: to fall; to drop
墜入 [ zhuì rù ]: to drop into; to fall into
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 隊 [ duì ] team, group, band, army unit; measure word for groups of people
    • 土 [ tǔ ] soil, earth; items made of earth
heisig_chinese_memo: One of the members of our air force regiment has been shot down; he managed to safely eject, but his plane plunged into the ground.
heisig_constituent: crash, regiment, pinnacle, parthenon, acropolis, animal horns, sow, pig, wart hog, regimental mascot, soil, dirt, ground
koohiiStory1: One of the members of our air force regiment has been shot down; he managed to safely eject, but his plane crashed into the ground.
koohiiStory2: The regiment led by horny Miss Piggy wearing a viking helmet accidently falls off The Pinnacle and crashes into the ground below. // old story with wrong meaning of regiment: Kermit is so frustrated with horny Miss Piggy´s regimented sex schedule, he throws her off The Pinnacle and she crashes into the ground.
jp_example_words: 墜落(ついらく): falling, crashing
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A pig with horns runs into a building and makes it fall into the dirt. This makes a loud crash sound. I mean, how could it not? The building literally crashed to the ground when the horned pig attacked it.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture a pig with horns crashing into a building and both of them crashing into the dirt. Uh oh, is the pig dead?
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You're worried about the pig, that was a pretty big crash, after all. So you yell, "SOOEY (つい)!" Here pig pig pig. SOOEEEYYY! You know—the universal call for pigs
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine walking around the crash site yelling "Sooey! Sooey!" over and over. You'll never know if the pig survived the crash if you don't.
Ru_Notes: Сравни: 堕 (おちる、ダ деградировать). В "деградировать" радикал "иметь", в "свалиться" радикал "свинья".
Ru_Radicals: 并, 土 (земля), 阡, 豕 (свинья)
Ru_trainchinese: zhuì: (глаг/сущ) упасть, свалиться; свисать; подвеска, свисающий объект
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the squad (隊) on the ground (土) has crashed
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: If you don't want your team to run into the ground (lose) sometimes you need to take a crash for the team.
humanum_full_description_en:
This is the " Team ", after adding " Earth ", write " Fall ". " Fall " from " earth ", " team " sound. The original meaning is to fall, to fall. "Er Ya. "Shi Gu Yi": "Falling, falling." "Shuowen Xinfu": "Changing, Chu also. From the soil, the team sound." Such as "The Analects. "Zi Zhang": "The way of civil and martial arts does not fall to the ground." "Chu Ci. "Guo Shang": "The banners cover the sun and the enemy is like a cloud, and the arrows are falling.

" Falling " also means loss. "Guang Ya. Interpretation II: "Falling, losing too." Such as "Shangshu. "Jun Xi": "Heaven descended to Yin for mourning, Yin Ji fell to his life." Kong Chuan: "Yin has fallen and lost his king's life." "Mandarin. "Chu Yu": "Since the first king shall not fall into his country, he shall perish when he is the king, and he will be the fault of the king." Wei Zhao's note: "Falling, losing."

" Falling " also means hanging or hanging. Such as "Pipe. "Situation": "Falling three steps from the shore, people are in great trouble, and the ape is drinking." "Dunhuang Quzi. "Fish Mermaid": "Plenty of incense and red beauty, and they are broken by beauties and branches, and gold hairpins are dropped." It also refers to dangling things. For example, the twelfth of Zhang Yu's "Poems in the Palace" of the Yuan Dynasty: "Find the gold-coated incense pendant and arrange the clothes to be twisted."
humanum_short_description_en: This is the " Team ", after adding " Earth ", written " Fall ". " Fall " from " earth ", " team " sound. The original meaning is to fall, to fall.
humanum_full_description:
本作「隊」，後增「土」旁，寫作「墜」。「墜」從「土」，「隊」聲。本義是墜下、墜落。《爾雅．釋詁一》：「墜，落也。」《說文新附》：「墜，陊也。从土，隊聲。」如《論語．子張》：「文武之道，未墜於地。」《楚辭．國殤》：「旌蔽日兮敵若雲，矢交墜兮士爭先。」

　　「墜」也表示喪失。《廣雅．釋詁二》：「墜，失也。」如《尚書．君奭》：「天降喪于殷，殷既墜厥命。」孔傳：「殷已墜失其王命。」《國語．楚語》：「自先王莫墜其國，當君而亡之，君之過也。」韋昭注：「墜，失也。」

　　「墜」還表示垂掛、懸掛。如《管子．形勢》：「墜岸三仞，人之所大難也，而猿猱飲焉。」《敦煌曲子詞．魚美人》：「香和紅艷一堆堆，又被美人和枝折，墜金釵。」又指懸垂之物。如元代張昱〈宮中詞〉之十二：「尋出塗金香墜子，安排衣線撚春綿。」
humanum_short_description: 本作「隊」，後增「土」旁，寫作「墜」。「墜」從「土」，「隊」聲。本義是墜下、墜落。

墜落(ついらく): falling, crashing

本作「 隊 」，後增「 土 」旁，寫作「 墜 」。「 墜 」從「 土 」，「 隊 」聲。本義是墜下、墜落。《爾雅．釋詁一》：「墜，落也。」《說文新附》：「墜，陊也。从土，隊聲。」如《論語．子張》：「文武之道，未墜於地。」《楚辭．國殤》：「旌蔽日兮敵若雲，矢交墜兮士爭先。」 「 墜 」也表示喪失。《廣雅．釋詁二》：「墜，失也。」如《尚書．君奭》：「天降喪于殷，殷既墜厥命。」孔傳：「殷已墜失其王命。」《國語．楚語》：「自先王莫墜其國，當君而亡之，君之過也。」韋昭注：「墜，失也。」 「 墜 」還表示垂掛、懸掛。如《管子．形勢》：「墜岸三仞，人之所大難也，而猿猱飲焉。」《敦煌曲子詞．魚美人》：「香和紅艷一堆堆，又被美人和枝折，墜金釵。」又指懸垂之物。如元代張昱〈宮中詞〉之十二：「尋出塗金香墜子，安排衣線撚春綿。」
This is the " Team", after adding " Earth", write " Fall". " Fall" from " earth", " team" sound. The original meaning is to fall, to fall. "Er Ya. "Shi Gu Yi": "Falling, falling." "Shuowen Xinfu": "Changing, Chu also. From the soil, the team sound." Such as "The Analects. "Zi Zhang": "The way of civil and martial arts does not fall to the ground." "Chu Ci. "Guo Shang": "The banners cover the sun and the enemy is like a cloud, and the arrows are falling. " Falling" also means loss. "Guang Ya. Interpretation II: "Falling, losing too." Such as "Shangshu. "Jun Xi": "Heaven descended to Yin for mourning, Yin Ji fell to his life." Kong Chuan: "Yin has fallen and lost his king's life." "Mandarin. "Chu Yu": "Since the first king shall not fall into his country, he shall perish when he is the king, and he will be the fault of the king." Wei Zhao's note: "Falling, losing." " Falling" also means hanging or hanging. Such as "Pipe. "Situation": "Falling three steps from the shore, people are in great trouble, and the ape is drinking." "Dunhuang Quzi. "Fish Mermaid": "Plenty of incense and red beauty, and they are broken by beauties and branches, and gold hairpins are dropped." It also refers to dangling things. For example, the twelfth of Zhang Yu's "Poems in the Palace" of the Yuan Dynasty: "Find the gold-coated incense pendant and arrange the clothes to be twisted."

墜字的基本解释

墜
zhuì
见“坠”。

墜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhuì］
［《廣韻》真類切，去至，澄。］
“隧2”的被通假字。“坠1”的繁体字。
(1)落下；陷入。
(2)丧失；败坏。
(3)毁坏。
(4)垂挂；因分量重而下垂。
(5)指垂挂在下面的东西，如各种饰物等。
(6)量词。犹阵。

墜字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　墜； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页238第22
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?直類切，垂去聲。【說文】侈也。【爾雅·釋詁】落也。【論語】未墜於地。【韓詩外傳】星墜木鳴，國人皆恐。又【集韻】直律切，音术。義同。䃍隊隧?古通，經史皆互見。

墜字的源字形

字源演变：

甲骨文金文楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
墜字的起名意思

暂无。

zhuì

fall
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhuì］
["Guangyun" is really cut, go to, and clear. ]
The false word for "tunnel 2". The traditional characters of "坠1".
(1) Falling; falling into.
(2) Loss; corruption.
(3) Destroyed.
(4) Hanging; sagging due to heavy weight.
(5) Refers to things hanging below, such as various ornaments.
(6) Quantifiers. Still array.
fall

[Han Shiwai Biography] Stars fall and woods scream, people in the country are afraid. Also 【Jiyun】Straight rhythm cutting, phonetic technique. The same meaning. Du team tunnel? zhuì
вм. 坠
Radicals: 阝, 豕, 土  (building, pig, dirt, horns)
Meaning Mnemonic
A pig with horns runs into a building and makes it fall into the dirt. This makes a loud crash sound. I mean, how could it not? The building literally crashed to the ground when the horned pig attacked it.
Picture a pig with horns crashing into a building and both of them crashing into the dirt. Uh oh, is the pig dead?
Reading Mnemonic
You're worried about the pig, that was a pretty big crash, after all. So you yell, "SOOEY (つい)!" Here pig pig pig. SOOEEEYYY! You know—the universal call for pigs
Imagine walking around the crash site yelling "Sooey! Sooey!" over and over. You'll never know if the pig survived the crash if you don't.
